casepack.title: DES Y3 Weyl Evolution Analysis
casepack.description: Modified gravity testing using DES Y3 MAGLIM data via Weyl evolution and hJ proxy. Source: doi:10.1038/s41467-024-53363-6

run_intent.notes: Demonstrates UMCP invariant mapping for cosmological observables. Maps hJ proxy to F analog, Sigma0 to omega analog. Axiom: AX-W0 Reference anchor defines deviation.

source_publication.title: Model-independent test of gravity with a network of galaxy surveys

axiom_demonstration.AX_W0: GR anchor at z* = 10 defines deviation meaning
